AttributeList.Name: Ageing
CustomProgression: Cannot be aged artificially (magic, disease, etc.)
Does not age at all

AttributeList.Name: Balance
AttributeList.Description: The character never loses his or her balance, even when running on a narrow rope or beam.

AttributeList.Name: Blind Fighting
AttributeList.Description: The character does not suffer normal penalties associated with attacking or defending with melee weapons or while unarmed in poor light, absolute darkness, or against an invisible opponent.

AttributeList.Name: Blind Shooting
AttributeList.Description: The character suffers reduced normal penalties associated with attacking with ranged weapons in poor light, absolute darkness, or against an invisible opponent. All penalties are reduced by [n] grade(s).

AttributeList.Name: Brutal
AttributeList.Description: Increases unarmed attacks to Weapon Level [n].

AttributeList.Name: Cat-Like
AttributeList.Description: The character will take half damage (round down) from most falls and always lands on his or her feet.

AttributeList.Name: Concealment
AttributeList.Description: The character�s weapons will not be noticed by anything short of an actual physical search (at -6 penalty).

AttributeList.Name: Critical Strike
AttributeList.Description: Increases critical hit damages to triple damage and quadruple damage respectively.

AttributeList.Name: Dead Eye
AttributeList.Description: The character is adept at attacking fast targets, which greatly reduces the penalties a character normally suffers. All penalties are reduced by one grade.

AttributeList.Name: Deflection
AttributeList.Description: With a successful defence roll, the character can 'stand his or ground' and deflect a ranged attack away harmlessly.

AttributeList.Name: Disease
CustomProgression: Extreme (+6) bonus to Stat rolls vs. disease
Total resistance

AttributeList.Name: Extended Range
AttributeList.Description: Double the effective, medium, and long ranges of ranged weapons

AttributeList.Name: Far Shot
AttributeList.Description: When using a ranged attack, reduce the total penalties associated with firing a weapon at medium or long range by one grade.

AttributeList.Name: Fast
AttributeList.Description: The character�s Body Stat is doubled for each assignment of this Attribute when calculating running speed.

AttributeList.Name: Flare Variable (1 type)
CustomProgression: Extreme (+6) bonus to resist
Total resistance

AttributeList.Name: Freezing Cold
CustomProgression: 1 EP damage/6 hours
Cannot freeze

AttributeList.Name: Freezing Water
CustomProgression: 1 EP damage/5 minutes
Cannot freeze

AttributeList.Name: Hardboiled
AttributeList.Description: The character�s Shock Value is increased by +[n*10]. This may not increase Shock Value to a higher value than one-half the Health Points total.

AttributeList.Name: High Pressure
CustomProgression: Survive high pressures
Survive crushing pressures

AttributeList.Name: Judge Opponent
AttributeList.Description: The character can judge his or her opponent's approximate Combat Value and weapon Skill Levels from the foe's attitude and posture even without actually seeing him or her fight. Additionally, the character can accurately estimate the opponent's remaining Health Points.

AttributeList.Name: Lack of Air
CustomProgression: Survive thin air
Does not breathe air

AttributeList.Name: Lack of Food
CustomProgression: Ignore hunger
Ignore starvation

AttributeList.Name: Lack of Water
CustomProgression: Ignore thirst
Ignore total dehydration

AttributeList.Name: Leap Attack
AttributeList.Description: Any time the character has a higher Initiative than their opponent and is free to move, they may attempt a leaping attack. If the strike is successful, the character gets an extra +1 to their Damage Multiplier. If the character fails to hit, however, the character is off balance and receives a significant (-3) penalty to any defence rolls until their turn to act in the following round

AttributeList.Name: Lethal Blow
AttributeList.Description: Inflict normal damage with unarmed attacks.

AttributeList.Name: Light-Footed
AttributeList.Description: The character can skim over sand, snow, or ice at full speed.

AttributeList.Name: Low Pressure
CustomProgression: Survive low pressures
Survive in vacuum

AttributeList.Name: Multiple Targets
AttributeList.Description: When attacking using the Multiple Targets with One Attack rules, the penalties for doing so reduced by one grade.

AttributeList.Name: Overheating
CustomProgression: 1 EP damage/days
Cannot overheat

AttributeList.Name: Poison
CustomProgression: Extreme (+6) bonus to Stat rolls vs. poison
Total resistance

AttributeList.Name: Portable Armoury
AttributeList.Description: The character will always have easy access to any weapon required for a particular task. The actual weapons and accessories must still be acquired via the Items Attribute.

AttributeList.Name: Precise Aim
AttributeList.Description: Increase the Aim or Wait bonus for pinpoint attacks to a significant (+3) bonus

AttributeList.Name: Reflection
AttributeList.Description: If the character has the Deflection Combat Technique and makes both a successful Deflection defence and a successful attack roll, they can reflect a ranged attack towards any target within range.

AttributeList.Name: Sleep
CustomProgression: Sleep once every 3-7 days
Never need to sleep

AttributeList.Name: Slithering
AttributeList.Description: The character can slither along the ground at normal walking/running speeds.

AttributeList.Name: Specific Weapon Variable
CustomProgression: Significant (+3) bonus to Stat rolls
Extreme (+6) bonus to Stat rolls

AttributeList.Name: Steady Hand
AttributeList.Description: All penalties for attacking while in motion are reduced by one grade.

AttributeList.Name: Swinging / Brachiating
AttributeList.Description: The character can swing through forests and cities using vines / ropes / webbing or simply his or her arms.

AttributeList.Name: Tournament Encyclopaedia
AttributeList.Description: Can recall the vital statistics and important quirks of practically all opponents that have fought in one type of tournament.  +3 bonus on Judge Opponent rolls.

AttributeList.Name: Two Weapons
AttributeList.Description: When attacking using the Two Weapons rules, the penalties for doing so reduced by one grade.

AttributeList.Name: Untrackable
AttributeList.Description: The character never leaves footprints or tracks when he or she walks or runs.

AttributeList.Name: Wall-Bouncing
AttributeList.Description: The character can move at regular walking speed without touching the ground by bounding back and forth between nearby vertical surfaces (walls).

AttributeList.Name: Wall-Crawling
AttributeList.Description: The character can cling to walls or ceilings as though they were on the ground or floor.

AttributeList.Name: Water-Walking
AttributeList.Description: The character can walk or run over water as if he or she was on land.

AttributeList.Name: Weapons Encyclopaedia
AttributeList.Description: Can recall the vital statistics and important quirks of practically all known commercially available weapons.

AttributeList.Name: Zen Direction
AttributeList.Description: When the character opens his or her mind to the natural world, he or she will always move in the �right� direction.

AttributeList.Name: Air-Tight
AttributeList.Description: Prevents the passage of gas molecules

AttributeList.Name: Aura
AttributeList.Description: Anyone touching/entering aura suffers the effect of level [n] version of this weapon attack.

AttributeList.Name: AutoFire
AttributeList.Description: Score one extra hit for every three the attack roll is above the minimum needed to succeed.

AttributeList.Name: Blight
AttributeList.Description: Target suffers double damage if they do not make a successful Body Stat roll TN:[(n+2)*3] to resist its effects.

AttributeList.Name: Blocks Incorporeal
AttributeList.Description: Prevents the passage of Insubstantial characters.

AttributeList.Name: Blocks Teleport
AttributeList.Description: Characters cannot teleport in or out.

AttributeList.Name: Contact
CustomProgression: Target must have extended contact with the substance (at least several minutes).
Only brief contact required.

AttributeList.Name: Drain
AttributeList.Description: Reduces specified stat of victim by [n]

AttributeList.Name: Field-Penetrating
AttributeList.Description: Can be used to interpenetrate other Force Fields while making attacks.

AttributeList.Name: Helper
AttributeList.Description: Allows both passengers and the driver or pilot to fire.

AttributeList.Name: Incurable
CustomProgression: Health Points lost to this attack cannot be restored using the Healing or Regeneration Attributes.
Health Points lost to this attack cannot be restored using the Healing or Regeneration Attributes. Natural recovery is also slowed.
No healing or other recovery is possible at all until some exotic event or treatment has occurred.

AttributeList.Name: Indirect
CustomProgression: Minimum range 50 of Range
Minimum range 10 of Range
No minimum range.

AttributeList.Name: Insidious
AttributeList.Description: Weapon damage completely bypasses any normal Armour Rating.

AttributeList.Name: Linked
AttributeList.Description: Attack is attached to another Weapon attack.

AttributeList.Name: Multidimensional
AttributeList.Description: Attack has normal effect on individuals who are Insubstantial

AttributeList.Name: Muscle
AttributeList.Description: Gain the Superstrength benefits when appropriate.

AttributeList.Name: Offensive
AttributeList.Description: Delivers a powerful electric or energy shockto anyone who touches it.

AttributeList.Name: Psychic
AttributeList.Description: Ignore the Armour Ratings of Armour, Shields, and Force Fields, and it affect Insubstantial characters normally.

AttributeList.Name: Reach
AttributeList.Description: Win initiative against shorter melee weapons.

AttributeList.Name: Regenerating
AttributeList.Description: Regain one lost Level of effectiveness per action spent.

AttributeList.Name: Selective
AttributeList.Description: Can specify who is or is not affected.

AttributeList.Name: Spreading
AttributeList.Description: -[n] penalty to defence roll. [2^(n-1)] Possible adjacent targets.

AttributeList.Name: Stun
AttributeList.Description: Inflicts temporary damage that shorts out electronics and renders people unconscious.

AttributeList.Name: Targeted
CustomProgression: Affects only a single individual or specific title-holder
Affects a specific group or relatively uncommon race
Affects a common race or condition

AttributeList.Name: Undetectable
AttributeList.Description: Provides no indication that it is about to strike, and does not reveal the identity of the attacker.

Variants.Name: Boosting
Variants.Desc: Can increase Stat values above their normal level (but not above 20), or raise Health or Energy Points beyond their normal level (but not more than twice normal)

Variants.Name: Restoring
Variants.Desc: Can only restore lost Energy or Health Points or Stat values

AttributeList.Name: Activation
CustomProgression: After the Attribute is used, the character may not move, use the Extra Actions Attribute, or make defence rolls for the rest of the round; if he or she has already moved or made a defence roll, the character cannot use activate the Attribute this round.
As above, but the character must also spend a general action preparing the Attribute before it is used.

As above, except that character must instead spend five general actions preparing the Attribute before it is used. Characters with the Extra Actions Attribute can use multiple actions in a round to accomplish this.
As above, except the character must instead spend an entire minute preparing the Attribute before it is used. The Extra Actions Attribute does not reduce this time.
As above, except the character must instead spend 10 minutes preparing the Attribute before it is used. The Extra Actions Attribute does not reduce this time.
As above, except the character must instead spend an hour preparing the Attribute before it is used. The Extra Actions Attribute does not reduce this time.

AttributeList.Name: Ammo
CustomProgression: 4-6 shots
2-3 shots
1 shot
Destroyed after a single use.

AttributeList.Name: Assisted
CustomProgression: A single assistant is required
A small group (2-9) is required.
A medium group (10-99) is required.
A large group (100-999) is required.
A very large group (1,000-9,999) is required.
A huge group (10,000 or more) is required.

AttributeList.Name: Backblast
CustomProgression: Affects anyone or anything standing directly behind the attacker (within 1-2 metres).
Affects a 1-2 metre radius that includes the user

AttributeList.Name: Backlash
CustomProgression: The backlash occurs if the character fails the roll by an extreme (6 or more) margin, and on any dice roll of 2.
The backlash occurs if the character fails the roll by a significant (3 or more) margin, and on any dice roll of 2.
The backlash occurs if the character fails the roll by a slight (1 or more) margin, and on any dice roll of 2.

AttributeList.Name: Both Directions
AttributeList.Description: Blocks attacks moving in any direction.

AttributeList.Name: Charges
CustomProgression: The character can only use the Attribute four to six times a day.
The character can only use the Attribute twice or three times a day.
The character can only use the Attribute once a day.

AttributeList.Name: Concentration
CustomProgression: The character can still perform other general actions, but cannot perform offensive actions, tactical actions, make defence rolls, or use other Attributes that also require Concentration.
The character can move at a slow speed and talk with others while using the Attribute, but cannot perform any combat actions or use any other Attribute.
The Attribute requires full concentration. The character cannot do anything else while using the Attribute; he or she must remain still and devote full attention to the Attribute.

AttributeList.Name: Consumable
CustomProgression: The focus is easy to replace.
The focus is hard to replace.
The focus is extremely hard to replace.

AttributeList.Name: Delay
CustomProgression: The effect of the Attribute does not take place until 1-12 hours after it is used.
The effect of the Attribute does not take place until 12 hours to a few days after it is used.
The effect of the Attribute does not take place until a few days to a few weeks after it is used.

AttributeList.Name: Dependent
AttributeList.Description: The Dependent Attribute cannot work until [n] other Attribute(s) are activated.

AttributeList.Name: Deplete
AttributeList.Description: Drains -[10*n] Energy Points from the user every time an instant use ability is attempted.  If used with Attributes that are normally ongoing, such as Armour, Flight, or Mind Control, reduce the Energy Points as follows: 1 every 10 minutes (- 1), 1 every 5 minutes (-2), 1 every minute (- 3), 1 every two rounds (-4), 1/round (-5), 2/round (- 6), 5/round (-7), 10/round (-8), 20/round (-9), or 50/round (-10).

AttributeList.Name: Detectable
CustomProgression: The Attribute�s use can be detected using 1-2 methods.
The Attribute�s use can be detected using 3-5 methods.
The Attribute�s use can be detected using 6-9 methods.

AttributeList.Name: Emotional
CustomProgression: The Attribute requires significant emotional involvement.
The Attribute requires strong emotional involvement.
The Attribute requires an extreme emotional involvement.

AttributeList.Name: Emphasised
AttributeList.Description: Provides double protection against the particular attack form and only half protection against other forms of damage.

AttributeList.Name: Environmental
CustomProgression: Adventures often take place in the environment.
Adventures occasionally take place in the environment.
Adventures rarely take place in the environment

AttributeList.Name: Equipment
CustomProgression: The equipment is easily portable, such as a laptop computer.
The equipment is awkward, such as a portable altar.
The equipment is static, such as a large workshop or lab.

AttributeList.Name: Exclusive
CustomProgression: Limited to a large group such as a common race or ethos.
Limited to a small group such as a rare race or organisation.
Limited to a single individual.

AttributeList.Name: Glide
AttributeList.Description: Can only become airborne if launched from a high place, gain speed by diving, gain altitude via thermals.

AttributeList.Name: Group
CustomProgression: Limited to a single broad group of plants.
Limited to a specific type of plant.

AttributeList.Name: Hands
AttributeList.Description: Requires two hands to operate or wield properly.

AttributeList.Name: Imbue
CustomProgression: The character can imbue 4-6 people with the Attribute.
The character can imbue 2-3 people with the Attribute.
The character can imbue 1 person with the Attribute.

AttributeList.Name: Ingest
AttributeList.Description: Must be ingested by the target in order to have an effect.

AttributeList.Name: Internal
AttributeList.Description: Only usable inside a specific building or other structure.

AttributeList.Name: Irreversible
CustomProgression: It takes several hours of work or special circumstances to enable the character to transform back to an earlier form.
As above, but the process requires expensive (or hard to find) replacement components, ingredients, or other prerequisites.
As above, but the process takes several days.

AttributeList.Name: Limited
CustomProgression: The field has a small limitation.
The field has a large limitation.

AttributeList.Name: Maintain
AttributeList.Description: Requires smooth surface or running start for landing and take off, must maintain a minimum speed once airborne.

AttributeList.Name: Maximum
AttributeList.Description: The character cannot use up to Level [n] of the Attribute. The Attribute must be at Level [n+1] or higher.

AttributeList.Name: Non-Penetrating
AttributeList.Description: Any Armour, Mind Shield, or Force Field Attribute stops an additional [n*4] damage (Armour) or [n*8] damage (Force Fields) but this additional damage cannot exceed the Armour Rating of the Armour or Force Field.

AttributeList.Name: Object
CustomProgression: The Item�s Attribute still provides significant benefit to the character.
The Item�s Attribute only provides slight benefit to the character.
The Item�s Attribute hardly provides any benefit to the character.

AttributeList.Name: Optimised
AttributeList.Description: Provides double protection against the particular attack form and no protection against other forms of damage.

AttributeList.Name: Partial
CustomProgression: The Attribute affects a large part of the body (torso, both legs, both arms, etc.).
The Attribute affects a small part of the body (one leg, one arm, abdomen, chest, head, etc.)
The Attribute affects a tiny part of the body (one hand, face, one foot, groin, knee, etc.).

AttributeList.Name: Recovery
AttributeList.Description: For every 1 minute the character uses the Attribute, they must wait [tn3] minute(s) before the Attribute functions once again.

AttributeList.Name: Road-Bound
CustomProgression: Half-speed off-road
Cannot be used on a rough surface.

AttributeList.Name: Shieldless
AttributeList.Description: Must turn off all Force Fields before using the attack, until following round.

AttributeList.Name: Skim
AttributeList.Description: Limited to skimming no more than a metre or two off the ground or water.

AttributeList.Name: Spread
AttributeList.Description: Requires plenty of free space surrounding to fly.

AttributeList.Name: Static
AttributeList.Description: Character cannot move when generating the field.

AttributeList.Name: Toxic
CustomProgression: Non-living material or characters who have the appropriate Special Defence Attributes are completely immune to the effects.

Non-living material or characters who have the appropriate Special Defence Attributes are completely immune to the effects.  In addition, a subject who is expecting the attack can render his or herself immune for at least one round.

AttributeList.Name: Unpredictable
CustomProgression: The character must make succeed with an average roll (Target Number 12) to use it. In non-combat situations, the character cannot attempt to use the Attribute again for 1-10 minutes.
The character must succeed with a difficult roll (Target Number 15). In non-combat situations, the character cannot attempt to use the Attribute again for 10 � 30 minutes.
The character must succeed with a challenging roll (Target Number 18). In non-combat situations, the character cannot attempt to use the Attribute again for 30 minutes � 2 hours.

AttributeList.Name: Unreliable
AttributeList.Description: Burns out on attack roll of a natural 2 or 3.

AttributeList.Name: Exorcism
AttributeList.Description: Used to reverse the results of the Mind Control Attribute.

AttributeList.Name: Insubstantial
CustomProgression: Water
Paper
Flesh and dirt
Wood
Rock
Aluminium
Iron and steel
Gold and Tungsten
Diamond
Energy (including Force Fields)

Variants.Name: Broad Category
Variants.Desc: Works over a broad category of targets.

Variants.Name: Specific Category
Variants.Desc: Works over a specific category of targets.

Variants.Name: Universal
Variants.Desc: Works on anything with a Mind Stat of 1 or higher.

Variants.Name: Very Broad Category
Variants.Desc: Works over a very broad category of targets.

Variants.Name: Very Specific Category
Variants.Desc: Works over a very specific category of targets.

AttributeList.Name: Organisational Ties
CustomProgression: Connected
Respected
Modest Authority
Local Authority
Regional Authority
Provincial Authority
National Authority
International Authority
Planetary Authority
Extraplanetary Authority

AttributeList.Name: Superstrength
AttributeList.Description: Can lift [sn1] tonne(s), +[n] to unarmed Damage Multiplier, +[2*n] bonus to strength-based Body stat rolls.

AttributeList.Name: Swarm
AttributeList.Description: [n] critters for every current Health point.

AttributeList.Name: Achilles Heel
CustomProgression: Points The attack form is rare.
The attack form is uncommon.
The attack form is common.

AttributeList.Name: Awkward Size
CustomProgression: Height: 3 � 4 metres, Mass: 200 � 1,200 kg
Height: 5 � 8 metres, Mass: 1.5 � 8 tonnes
Height: 9 � 15 metres, Mass: 10 � 60 tonnes
Height: 16 � 30 metres, Mass: 75 � 500 tonnes
Height: 31 � 60 metres, Mass: 550 � 4,000 tonnes
Height: 61 � 125 metres, Mass: 4 k � 30 k tonnes
Height: 126 � 250 metres, Mass: 40 k � 250 k tonnes
Height: 251 � 500 metres, Mass: 300 k � 2 M tonnes
Height: 501 � 1,000 metres, Mass: 2 M � 15 M tonnes
Height: 1,000 � 2,000 metres, Mass: 2 M � 125 M tonnes

AttributeList.Name: Bane
AttributeList.Description: [20*n] damage points per round of exposure

AttributeList.Name: Blind Fury
CustomProgression: Initiating the Blind Fury is difficult; reverting to normal emotional state is easy.
Initiating the Blind Fury and reverting to a normal emotional state are both moderately difficult.
Initiating the Blind Fury is easy; reverting to normal emotional state is difficult.

AttributeList.Name: Conditional Ownership
CustomProgression: Mild conditions are imposed on the objects� ownership and usage.
Strict conditions are imposed on the objects� ownership and usage.
Severe conditions are imposed on the objects� ownership and usage.

AttributeList.Name: Confined Movement
CustomProgression: Restricted to a large area (100 km radius), such as a single county or large city.
Restricted to a small area (1 km radius), such as a small town or large, multi-structure complex.
Restricted to a tiny area (100 m radius), such as a small village or single building.

AttributeList.Name: Cursed
CustomProgression: The character suffers from a slight disadvantage.
The character suffers from a moderate disadvantage.
The character suffers from a severe disadvantage.

AttributeList.Name: Easily Distracted
CustomProgression: The character is distracted by a trigger that is encountered infrequently.
The character is distracted by a few infrequent triggers, or by one trigger that is encountered frequently.
The character is distracted by several infrequent triggers, or by one trigger that is encountered constantly.

AttributeList.Name: Girl/Guy Magnet
CustomProgression: At any one time, only a couple of girls/guys are actively chasing the character.
Three or more girls/guys are after the character; a new one appears every few adventures.
Swarms of girls/guys may be after the character; a new one appears nearly every adventure.

AttributeList.Name: Hounded
CustomProgression: The constant attention the character receives is slightly inconvenient.
The constant attention the character receives is moderately inconvenient.
The constant attention the character receives is severely inconvenient.

AttributeList.Name: Impaired Manipulation
CustomProgression: The character only has one usable arm. He or she cannot hold onto objects while punching or using a hand-held weapon.

The character has rudimentary manipulative ability using paws or talons, such as a bear, octopus, dragon, or bird. It can grapple and lift things, but not perform tasks that require fine manipulation or tool use, such as firing a pistol or using most hand-held Items.

The character has no useable arms. He or she cannot carry hand-held weapons, grab or push objects, or punch enemies in combat. This rank includes animals with no manipulative ability, such as horses, fish, or snakes.

AttributeList.Name: Impaired Speech
CustomProgression: The character has a severe speech impediment, which will give him or her a significant (-3) penalty on rolls where clear or quick speech is required. This can also represent an entity whose speech is clear to his or her own species but onan unusual wavelength or mode that prevents easy communication with other races.
The character can communicate with a range of sounds that carry emotional content but which are not language, such as the sounds made by normal animals.
The character is completely mute with no way to verbally communicate.

AttributeList.Name: Inept Attack
AttributeList.Description: The character�s Attack Combat Value is decreased by [n] Point(s).

AttributeList.Name: Inept Defence
AttributeList.Description: The character�s DCV is decreased by [n] Point(s).

AttributeList.Name: Involuntary Change
CustomProgression: It is difficult to trigger the Involuntary Change.
It is moderately easy to trigger the Involuntary Change.
It is easy to trigger the Involuntary Change.

AttributeList.Name: Ism
CustomProgression: The character experiences a small degree of discrimination.
The character experiences a large degree of discrimination.
The character experiences a severe degree of discrimination.

AttributeList.Name: Marked
CustomProgression: The mark is easily concealable because it is small or in an inconspicuous location.
The mark can be concealed, but this is difficult because it is large or in an obvious location.
Under most circumstances, the mark cannot be concealed because it affects the character�s entire body.

AttributeList.Name: Nemesis
CustomProgression: The Nemesis is merely annoying and/or interferes infrequently.
The Nemesis may actively try to harm the character and/or interferes frequently.
The Nemesis will always harm the character given the opportunity, and/or interferes constantly.

AttributeList.Name: Not So Tough
AttributeList.Description: The character�s Health Points are decreased by [5*n] Points.

AttributeList.Name: Owned
CustomProgression: The organisation has partial ownership of the character; the character is subject to slight punishment for opposing the owners.
The organisation has significant ownership of the character; the character is subject to moderate punishment for opposing the owners.
The organisation has total ownership of the character; the character is subject to severe punishment for opposing the owners.

AttributeList.Name: Phobia
CustomProgression: The character has a slight phobia or one that is encountered infrequently.
The character has a moderate phobia or one that is encountered frequently.
The character has a severe phobia or one that is encountered constantly.

AttributeList.Name: Physical Impairment
CustomProgression: The impairment is a slight inconvenience to the character.
The impairment is a moderate inconvenience to the character.
The impairment is a severe inconvenience to the character.

AttributeList.Name: Recurring Nightmares
CustomProgression: The nightmares occur infrequently and have a slight effect on the character�s lifestyle.
The nightmares occur frequently and have a moderate effect on the character�s lifestyle.
The nightmares occur constantly and have a severe effect on the character�s lifestyle.

AttributeList.Name: Red Tape
CustomProgression: The Red Tape only impedes the character before or after a major action (but not both) and/or the Red Tape is easy to manage most of the time.
The Red Tape impedes a character both before and after a major action, and/or is difficult to manage most of the time.
The Red Tape impedes a character before, after, and during a major action, and/or is extremely difficult to manage most of the time.

AttributeList.Name: Reduced Damage
CustomProgression: Damage the character delivers in combat is reduced by 1.
The character only adds half his or her Attack Combat Value when determining attack damage.
The character�s Damage Multiplier (page 105) is reduced by 1.

AttributeList.Name: Sensory Impairment
CustomProgression: The character has a diminished primary sense (such as short-sightedness or being hard of hearing), or has lost a secondary sense (such as taste or smell).
The character has completely lost a primary sense (sight or hearing), or has two diminished primary senses, or has completely lost multiple secondary senses.
The character has completely lost a primary sense (sight or hearing) and multiple secondary senses.

AttributeList.Name: Significant Other
CustomProgression: The S.O. is rarely placed in grave danger and appears infrequently.
The S.O. is often placed in grave danger and appears frequently.
The S.O. is always placed in grave danger and appears constantly.

AttributeList.Name: Skeleton in the Closet
CustomProgression: The Skeleton is difficult to discover, and/or the consequences of discovery are slight, and/or the character�s reputation will be impacted slightly.
The Skeleton is relatively easy to discover, and/or the consequences of discovery are moderate, and/or the character�s reputation will be seriously impacted.
The Skeleton is very easy to discover, and/or the consequences of discovery are severe, and/or the character�s reputation will be devastated.

AttributeList.Name: Special Requirement
CustomProgression: The Special Requirement is easy to obtain and/or needed infrequently.
The Special Requirement is difficult to obtain and/or needed frequently.
The Special Requirement is extremely difficult to obtain and/or needed constantly.

AttributeList.Name: Unappealing
CustomProgression: The character is slightly unappealing.
The character is moderately unappealing.
The character is severely unappealing.

AttributeList.Name: Vulnerability
CustomProgression: The character�s accessible Attribute Levels all drop by one-quarter (round up) when affected by the Vulnerability.
The character�s accessible Attribute Levels all drop by one-half (round up) when affected by the Vulnerability.
The character cannot use any Attributes when affected by the Vulnerability.

AttributeList.Name: Wanted
CustomProgression: The reward, contract, or other incentive offered to hunt the character is minor.
The reward, contract, or other incentive offered to hunt the character is significant.
The reward, contract, or other incentive offered to hunt the character is extreme.

AttributeList.Name: Weak Point
CustomProgression: The weak point is tiny (-6 extreme Called Shot penalty).
The weak point is small (-3 significant Called Shot penalty).
The weak point is large (-1 slight Called Shot penalty).

AttributeList.Name: Performing Arts
AttributeList.Stat: Average of Body Mind and Soul
